          <title>
            <string language="de">The German Defeat in Perspective</string>
            <string language="en">The German Defeat in Perspective</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La défaite allemande dans la perspective</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A derrota alemão no perspective</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sconfitta tedesca nella prospettiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γερμανική ήττα στην προοπτική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La derrota alemana en perspectiva</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Quantitativer Vergleich der Kriegsopfer während des Zweiten Weltkrieges in verschiednen Ländern der Welt. Text zur Vertreibung der Polen 1943. Fragen zum Text.</string>
            <string language="en">Quantitative comparison of the number of war victims during World War II in different countries of the world. Text about forced displacement of Polish people in 1943. Questions on the text</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">2. Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Krieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Polen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">2. World war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">War</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Post-war period</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Germany</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Victims</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Driving out</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Poland</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparaison quantitative du nombre de victimes de 
guerre pendant la deuxième guerre mondiale dans différents pays du 
monde. Texte au sujet du déplacement obligatoire des personnes 
polonaises en 1943. Questions sur le texte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparação quantitative do número de vítimas da
guerra durante a segunda guerra mundial em países diferentes do 
mundo. Texto sobre deslocamento forçado de povos poloneses em 
1943. Perguntas no texto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronto quantitativo del numero di vittime di 
guerra durante la seconda guerra mondiale in paesi differenti del 
mondo. Testo circa spostamento forzato della gente polacca in 
1943. Domande sul testo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποσοτική σύγκριση του αριθμού πολεμικών θυμάτων κατά
τη διάρκεια του παγκόσμιου πολέμου ΙΙ στις διαφορετικές χώρες του
κόσμου. Κείμενο για την αναγκασμένη μετατόπιση των 
πολωνικών λαών σε 1943, ερωτήσεις στο κείμενο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparación cuantitativa del número de las 
víctimas de la guerra durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial en diversos 
países del mundo. Texto sobre la dislocación forzada de la 
gente polaca en 1943. Preguntas sobre el texto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">2. Guerre mondiale</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerre</string>
          </keyword>
